description:
"Get started on your mission to save the world with the Overwatch 2: Invasion Bundle!

This bundle includes:
-	Access to Invasion Story Missions
-	1,000 Overwatch Coins 
-	Vigilante Sojourn Legendary Skin*
-	Sojourn hero unlock*

With your Overwatch Coins, you can purchase in-game cosmetic items. *Unlocked upon completing Story Missions."
